metadata.title: CVE-2022-26874 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: lib/Horde/Mime/Viewer/Ooo.php in Horde Mime_Viewer before 2.2.4 allows XSSvia an OpenOffice document, leading to account takeover in Horde GroupwareWebmail Edition. This occurs after XSLT rendering.

criterions.comment: php-horde-mime-viewer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
